layman_description: Controls how quickly a knocked-down enemy recovers their ability to get back up.
technical_description: Sets the rate at which a prone entity regenerates knockdown recovery time after being stunned.
player_impact: Affects how long knocked-down enemies stay down before they can stand again.

layman_description: Determines how long an enemy remains stunned and knocked down on the ground.
technical_description: Specifies the duration in seconds that a prone entity remains in stun state.
player_impact: Longer durations give players more time to deal damage to immobilized enemies.

layman_description: Sets the name shown in the menu when you interact with a block to harvest its resources.
technical_description: References the language key string displayed for harvest interaction prompts.
player_impact: Affects what the menu call to action displays when examining farmable or harvestable blocks.

layman_description: The longest time allowed for a block to finish converting one resource into another.
technical_description: Specifies the maximum duration in game ticks for conversion processes on blocks.
player_impact: Determines the upper time limit for crafting or transforming operations within block-based machines.

layman_description: How far away from an entity the owner can be before it stops responding to their commands.
technical_description: Sets the maximum distance in meters from the owner at which an entity remains active.
player_impact: Limits how far your summon or pet can wander before it stops listening to you.

layman_description: The shortest time allowed for a block to complete converting one resource into another.
technical_description: Specifies the minimum duration in game ticks for conversion processes on blocks.
player_impact: Establishes the lower time bound for crafting or transformation speed within blocks.

layman_description: Links a stair block to its flipped version so both orientations work in the game.
technical_description: References the mirrored block variant for bi-directional staircase placements.
player_impact: Allows you to place stairs facing either direction by connecting to the opposite-facing block.

layman_description: Controls which mod variations are available as visual choices when you customize a block.
technical_description: Specifies which mod transformation variants are selectable for block modification systems.
player_impact: Determines which customization options appear in the menu when upgrading or modifying blocks.

layman_description: Lists the kinds of upgrades you can apply to a block, like making it faster or stronger.
technical_description: Defines the categories of modifications available for block enhancement systems.
player_impact: Determines what kinds of improvements you can make to blocks through the modification system.

layman_description: The number of upgraded versions of a conversion block that are currently active.
technical_description: Tracks the quantity of modified conversion block instances in the current system.
player_impact: Affects how many upgraded conversion processes can run simultaneously in your setup.

layman_description: How much faster an upgraded block converts resources compared to its basic version.
technical_description: Multiplier value for conversion speed applied by block modifications.
player_impact: Upgraded blocks process resources significantly faster than standard versions.

layman_description: Specifies what item a modified block produces after converting its input resources.
technical_description: References the output inventory item created by modified conversion processes.
player_impact: Determines what end product you get from improved resource conversion blocks.

layman_description: Whether an item makes things bigger or smaller when you use it on the game world.
technical_description: Setting that defines whether an item applies growth or shrinkage effects to targets.
player_impact: Controls the expansion or reduction effect the item has when applied to objects.

layman_description: Adds random variation to how fast different individuals of the same type move around.
technical_description: Random multiplier range applied to movement speed for entity variety.
player_impact: Makes creatures and NPCs move at slightly different speeds for more natural behavior.

layman_description: Specifies which sound effect plays when a block is triggered or activated.
technical_description: References the audio file to play when the block performs its action.
player_impact: Provides audio feedback when traps or interactive blocks activate during gameplay.

layman_description: Controls whether an entity's body goes limp and realistic when it dies or gets knocked down.
technical_description: Setting that enables physics-based body simulation for fallen or dead entities.
player_impact: Affects whether creatures collapse naturally or remain in fixed death poses.

layman_description: The number of detection lines used to check what's in front of a block or entity.
technical_description: Specifies the quantity of raycast queries used for collision or detection systems.
player_impact: More rays improve detection accuracy but may impact performance.

layman_description: Whether the visible picture of an item disappears from the game world when used up.
technical_description: Flag that determines if the visual model is removed from the scene when the item is consumed.
player_impact: Controls whether spent items vanish instantly or leave visual remnants in the world.

layman_description: Lists the specific tools or items a player must have equipped to use a particular block.
technical_description: Defines prerequisite tool items required for block interaction or operation.
player_impact: Forces you to acquire and bring specific tools to access certain blocks' functionality.

layman_description: Forces you to only use the tools specified for a block, preventing alternatives.
technical_description: Boolean setting that restricts block interaction exclusively to specified tool items.
player_impact: Ensures only exact tools work with certain blocks, preventing workarounds with similar items.

layman_description: Prevents you from placing a block underwater or in water-filled areas.
technical_description: Boolean flag that blocks placement of objects in submerged or flooded environments.
player_impact: Restricts building in water, forcing you to construct on dry land or drain areas first.

layman_description: The scale or magnitude of an entity, determining how large it appears in the world.
technical_description: Value controlling the 3D shape size multiplier for entity rendering.
player_impact: Larger creatures take up more space and may be more intimidating or visible.

layman_description: The warning sound that plays before a creature self-destructs or explodes.
technical_description: Audio reference for the pre-explosion alarm sound emitted by volatile entities.
player_impact: Gives players audio warning to run away before a dangerous enemy explodes.

layman_description: The background sound an active tool makes while you're holding it ready to use.
technical_description: Audio reference for the continuous idle state sound of weapons or tools.
player_impact: Creates atmosphere and feedback while a tool is equipped and waiting.

layman_description: The sound a sleeping zombie makes when it lies back down after being disturbed.
technical_description: Audio reference for the vocalization when a dormant entity returns to rest state.
player_impact: Provides feedback when you alert but don't fully wake a sleeping enemy.

layman_description: The sound a sleeping zombie makes when it first notices something nearby.
technical_description: Audio reference for the alert vocalization when a dormant entity detects disturbance.
player_impact: Warns you when a sleeping enemy becomes aware of your presence.

layman_description: A repeating beep or clock-like sound that marks time passing for something like a bomb.
technical_description: Audio reference for periodic ticking sounds used for countdown or charging effects.
player_impact: Provides urgent audio feedback for time-limited actions like explosives or charging attacks.

layman_description: Notes vehicle upgrades that still need to be developed or implemented.
technical_description: Placeholder property for incomplete vehicle modification systems.
player_impact: Indicates planned vehicle improvements not yet available in the current version.

layman_description: How much water an item can hold before it becomes full.
technical_description: Volume value in arbitrary units for water storage capacity of containers.
player_impact: Determines how long a water container lasts before needing refill.

layman_description: Defines the boundaries and angle of a water surface inside a block structure.
technical_description: Plane equation coefficients that define water surface geometry within blocks.
player_impact: Creates realistic water surfaces and boundaries inside water-filled building interiors.

layman_description: Which direction of movement a vehicle wheel or part rotates around.
technical_description: Specifies the axis identifier for rotation application on vehicle parts.
player_impact: Determines the orientation and function of wheels and moving components on vehicles.

layman_description: The sound effect that plays when a vehicle hits something and bounces.
technical_description: Audio reference for collision bounce events on vehicles.
player_impact: Provides feedback when driving over rough terrain or hitting obstacles.

layman_description: What substance a projectile is made of, affecting what it damages well.
technical_description: Material type identifier for projectile objects affecting damage calculations.
player_impact: Ammunition material determines its effectiveness against different armor and structures.

layman_description: Power delivery settings for the second gear ratio in a vehicle's transmission.
technical_description: Transmission gear parameters including power range and efficiency values.
player_impact: Controls vehicle acceleration and speed behavior when in second gear.

layman_description: Power delivery settings for the third gear ratio in a vehicle's transmission.
technical_description: Transmission gear parameters including power range and efficiency values.
player_impact: Controls vehicle acceleration and speed behavior when in third gear.

layman_description: Power delivery settings for the fourth and highest gear ratio in a vehicle.
technical_description: Transmission gear parameters including power range and efficiency values.
player_impact: Controls maximum vehicle speed and highway efficiency when in fourth gear.

layman_description: Tracks which version of bulletproof glass a block is using for display and protection.
technical_description: Variant index for different bulletproof glass 3D shape models and properties.
player_impact: Determines the visual appearance and damage resistance of protective glass structures.

layman_description: The 3D shape and form that represents a vehicle part visually in the game world.
technical_description: 3D shape model reference for vehicle rendering and visual representation.
player_impact: Affects the appearance and visual details of vehicle components.

layman_description: How many units of small rock you get when you harvest a given block.
technical_description: Drop quantity value for stone resource harvested from specific blocks.
player_impact: Determines how much stone material you collect from destroying certain blocks.

layman_description: The range of how quickly an engine spins up when you press the accelerator.
technical_description: Engine acceleration rate parameters for minimum and maximum RPM increase.
player_impact: Controls how responsive a vehicle feels when you start accelerating from idle.

layman_description: How much the engine slows down naturally when you're not pressing the accelerator.
technical_description: Friction coefficient for engine RPM decrease during idle or coasting.
player_impact: Affects how quickly a vehicle engine winds down when you release the gas pedal.

layman_description: The highest RPM a vehicle engine can reach before it starts losing efficiency.
technical_description: Maximum revolutions per minute limit for engine operation.
player_impact: Caps the top speed a vehicle can achieve regardless of power applied.

layman_description: The sound effect when a vehicle's tires lose grip and skid on the ground.
technical_description: Audio reference for tire skidding and sliding friction effects.
player_impact: Provides feedback when losing traction while driving.

layman_description: How sharp a vehicle can turn its front wheels for steering.
technical_description: Maximum steering angle in degrees for vehicle direction control.
player_impact: Controls how tight a turning radius a vehicle can achieve.

layman_description: The angle threshold that triggers maximum steering response for a vehicle.
technical_description: Steering saturation angle for control input mapping.
player_impact: Affects the sensitivity and responsiveness of steering controls.

layman_description: The vehicle part that physically rotates to change the steering direction.
technical_description: Bone or attachment point name for steering mechanism animation.
player_impact: Determines which visible part of the vehicle responds when you turn.

layman_description: A knockdown effect state identifier for tracking creature stumbling.
technical_description: Named state constant for landing and knockdown state classification.
player_impact: Used internally to manage creature response when they land from being knocked up.

layman_description: A minor knockdown or stumble state for creatures that lose balance briefly.
technical_description: Named state constant for minor knockdown without full body collapse.
player_impact: Triggers shorter stun durations when creatures barely stumble.

layman_description: A neutral state indicator meaning no active knockdown or stun effect is occurring.
technical_description: Named state constant representing absence of knockdown status.
player_impact: Indicates the creature is fully recovered and can act normally.

layman_description: A state where a creature loses footing momentarily but doesn't fully fall down.
technical_description: Named state constant for partial balance loss and staggering animation.
player_impact: Creates intermediate difficulty where enemies stumble but recover faster than knockdowns.

layman_description: How much extra experience you earn using this particular item compared to normal.
technical_description: Multiplier value for experience gain from actions performed with this item.
player_impact: Using this item teaches you skills faster than using other tools.

layman_description: Which part of an item's picture glows brighter when you activate or use it.
technical_description: Named setting for self-illuminating areas triggered by item activation.
player_impact: Provides visual feedback when activating tools or weapons.

layman_description: The special event that triggers when this particular block is activated or used.
technical_description: Named event identifier executed when the block receives an activation signal.
player_impact: Determines what happens when you interact with or trigger the block.

layman_description: Whether you can remove this item from your hands once you've equipped it.
technical_description: Boolean flag controlling whether the item can be unequipped after activation.
player_impact: Some items lock in place and cannot be put away until their action completes.

layman_description: An alternate picture symbol shown in the menu for this item's secondary function.
technical_description: Alternative icon name displayed for alternate item interaction modes.
player_impact: Helps you understand what the item can do beyond its main purpose.

layman_description: How long the animation plays before the action takes effect when using an item.
technical_description: Duration in seconds for animation playback before action application.
player_impact: Affects the timing between when you activate an item and when it actually works.

layman_description: What basic type of entity this is, like which trader or character template it follows.
technical_description: Entity classification reference for behavior and stat inheritance.
player_impact: Determines the fundamental abilities and appearance template the entity uses.

layman_description: Whether you automatically grab and hold this item when you pick it up.
technical_description: Boolean that enables automatic item placement into active inventory slot.
player_impact: Some items instantly go into your hands when looted instead of the menu.

layman_description: How long a rechargeable battery lasts before it runs out of charge.
technical_description: Duration value in minutes for complete battery depletion from full charge.
player_impact: Determines how long powered tools operate before needing a recharge.

layman_description: The electrical power level a rechargeable battery can safely supply.
technical_description: Voltage rating for maximum power delivery capacity of the battery.
player_impact: Determines which powered devices the battery can operate.

layman_description: How far away from you the item can affect or place blocks when you use it.
technical_description: Maximum distance in meters for block placement or modification effect.
player_impact: Determines your reach when placing or interacting with blocks at distance.

layman_description: Specifies which types of blocks this tool can be used on.
technical_description: Tag filter for valid block types that accept this item's interaction.
player_impact: Some tools only work on specific materials and refuse to interact with others.

layman_description: The damage level at which a block shows visible cracks and looks deteriorating.
technical_description: Health percentage threshold at which breaking visual state displays.
player_impact: Blocks show their wear visually when they reach half health.

layman_description: The damage point where a block becomes completely destroyed and vanishes.
technical_description: Health percentage threshold at which block is considered fully destroyed.
player_impact: Blocks collapse entirely when they drop to very low durability.

layman_description: The probability that using this block gives you a beneficial effect.
technical_description: Percentage likelihood of applying positive status effects when block is used.
player_impact: Some blocks randomly grant temporary benefits when you use them.

layman_description: The substance a projectile is made of, determining its damage properties.
technical_description: Material category identifier for projectile type classification.
player_impact: Ammunition effectiveness varies based on what materials it's made from.

layman_description: Whether this creature can scale straight up walls without jumping.
technical_description: Boolean enabling wall-climbing movement for entities without jump assistance.
player_impact: Some enemies can climb vertical surfaces making them more dangerous.

layman_description: How much power is used each time you trigger a powered device or item.
technical_description: Energy consumption value per activation event for power systems.
player_impact: Determines how many uses you get from a charged battery or power source.

layman_description: Whether using this item on a block duplicates its structure for building.
technical_description: Boolean enabling block cloning functionality for this tool.
player_impact: Allows you to quickly copy and place matching blocks.

layman_description: How much extra food you get from crops that have bonuses applied.
technical_description: Divisor value determining bonus harvest yield multiplication factor.
player_impact: Bonus crops produce significantly more food when harvested.

layman_description: A special action that triggers when you interact with this block the first way.
technical_description: Named event executed when custom interaction option one is selected.
player_impact: Blocks can perform multiple different actions based on how you interact.

layman_description: A special action that triggers when you interact with this block the second way.
technical_description: Named event executed when custom interaction option two is selected.
player_impact: Blocks can perform different actions based on which interaction you choose.

layman_description: The picture symbol shown for the first custom interaction option in the menu.
technical_description: Icon name displayed for the first custom command menu option.
player_impact: Shows you what the first alternative action does when you hover over it.

layman_description: The picture symbol shown for the second custom interaction option in the menu.
technical_description: Icon name displayed for the second custom command menu option.
player_impact: Shows you what the second alternative action does when you hover over it.

layman_description: The menu text label for the first alternative way to interact with this block.
technical_description: Localized text name for the first custom interaction command option.
player_impact: Tells you what happens when you select the first alternative interaction.

layman_description: The menu text label for the second alternative way to interact with this block.
technical_description: Localized text name for the second custom interaction command option.
player_impact: Tells you what happens when you select the second alternative interaction.

layman_description: Extra damage you deal when hitting enemies through or with glass material.
technical_description: Damage multiplier for attacks against glass-based materials.
player_impact: Glass structures take normal damage from most weapons.

layman_description: Extra damage you deal when hitting an enemy's head compared to other body parts.
technical_description: Damage multiplier specifically for head-targeted strikes.
player_impact: Headshots are significantly more deadly than body shots.

layman_description: Extra damage you deal when hitting metallic structures or enemies.
technical_description: Damage multiplier for attacks against metal-based materials.
player_impact: Metal barriers are resistant and require more hits than wood to destroy.

layman_description: Extra damage you deal when hitting stone structures or rocky enemies.
technical_description: Damage multiplier for attacks against stone-based materials.
player_impact: Stone walls are resistant to damage and take longer to destroy.

layman_description: A special event that triggers when something damages this block or entity.
technical_description: Named event executed when the object receives damage.
player_impact: Blocks can react to taking damage by activating special effects.

layman_description: How long a dead creature remains in the world before disappearing.
technical_description: Duration in seconds before a corpse is removed from the game world.
player_impact: Bodies stick around briefly before vanishing, letting you loot them.

layman_description: How heavy and solid a block feels physically in the game.
technical_description: Mass density value affecting physics simulation for the block.
player_impact: Heavier blocks require more force to move or knock around.

layman_description: Help text shown in the menu that explains what this item does.
technical_description: Localization key for item action description text.
player_impact: Tooltip shows you detailed information about the item's function.

layman_description: What kind of container appears where a creature dies to hold their dropped items.
technical_description: Block type spawned to hold loot when this entity is defeated.
player_impact: Defeated enemies leave behind containers of useful items and supplies.

layman_description: How much weight this item adds to your total load when carrying it.
technical_description: Weight value in inventory units affecting character carrying capacity.
player_impact: Light items don't slow you down much but heavy ones significantly reduce speed.

layman_description: The sound that plays when a trap or activated block finishes its action.
technical_description: Audio reference for completion sound played at end of block activation.
player_impact: Provides auditory feedback that a trap or device has finished operating.

layman_description: What kind of creature or object spawn this item summons into the world.
technical_description: Entity type identifier for the 3D shape created by this item.
player_impact: Determines what appears when you use this summoning or spawning item.

layman_description: How far from where you use the item the summoned creature appears.
technical_description: Position offset coordinates relative to item usage point for entity spawn.
player_impact: Controls where summoned creatures materialize relative to you.

layman_description: How long after a creature triggers before it explodes in a dangerous burst.
technical_description: Countdown duration in seconds before explosive detonation occurs.
player_impact: Gives you a warning before a volatile enemy explodes nearby.

layman_description: Which specific block types are destroyed with extra force by this explosion.
technical_description: Tagged block categories affected by specialized explosion damage.
player_impact: Certain explosives destroy specific structures like doors and safes more effectively.

layman_description: Extra damage multiplier when an explosion hits certain types of structures or enemies.
technical_description: Damage bonus percentage applied to tagged targets caught in explosions.
player_impact: Explosions damage certain structures and creatures much more severely.

layman_description: The category of damage an explosion deals, affecting what it damages well.
technical_description: Damage classification for explosion effect resistance calculations.
player_impact: Explosion damage bypasses some protections that block other damage types.

layman_description: How long the explosion effect persists and continues dealing damage.
technical_description: Time duration in seconds for active explosion damage application.
player_impact: Long-lasting explosions hurt creatures that move through the blast area.

layman_description: Whether an explosion alerts nearby zombies regardless of your stealth.
technical_description: Boolean setting to bypass thermal detection when explosion triggers.
player_impact: Some explosions are loud enough to attract zombies from far away.

layman_description: What kinds of resources you can burn to power this machine or engine.
technical_description: List of acceptable fuel items and their energy values for consumption.
player_impact: Machines require specific fuel types and won't run on wrong materials.

layman_description: Whether this item's effectiveness scales with the quality level of another equipped weapon.
technical_description: Boolean enabling quality inheritance from wielded weapons.
player_impact: Better weapons make this tool work better when used alongside them.

layman_description: How long it takes for this creature to complete a self-healing action.
technical_description: Animation duration for entity healing ability performance.
player_impact: Enemies that heal take time to recover, giving you a chance to interrupt.

layman_description: How long an entity must wait before it can heal itself again.
technical_description: Cooldown duration in seconds between repeated healing actions.
player_impact: Creatures that heal can't spam healing, forcing spacing between recoveries.

layman_description: The health level an entity waits for before attempting to heal itself.
technical_description: Minimum damage percentage that triggers healing behavior.
player_impact: Enemies only heal when they've been hurt enough to need recovery.

layman_description: Whether this creature type appears as an option in the admin spawn menu.
technical_description: Boolean flag controlling entity visibility in spawn command lists.
player_impact: Some special entities are hidden from casual spawning options.
